head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RUVANE, JOSEPH J. JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RUVANE, JOSEPH J. JR.

block.p: RUVANE-Joseph J. Jr. Died June 21, 2000. A funeral mass will be held at St. Bernadette's Church, Route 390, Canadensis, PA on Monday, July 17 at 10:00 AM. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The Joseph J. Ruvane Jr. Memorial Fund, Duke Cancer Center, PO Box 3828, Durham, NC 27710.

RUVANE-Joseph J. Jr. Died June 21, 2000. A funeral mass will be held at St. Bernadette's Church, Route 390, Canadensis, PA on Monday, July 17 at 10:00 AM. Interment private.
